Topic.Title: KO has a problem being a new Competitor

Topic.Title: KO has a problem being a new Competitor

Message.Msg: Wow, never heard anyone say it even tastes good, much less "better". All I heard from people who sampled Soda Stream is that it leaves a horrible aftertaste and film in your mouth. How many of the alleged 600,000 machines sold this Xmas have been returned already?
